document_data.mainbody:
Mulgomirs Way was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Mulgomirs Way was located in Waterdeeps Castle Ward. It ran north to south in between two larger avenuesâ€”the Street of Silks to the west and the Street of Silver to the east. Mulgomirs Way originated in the north on Selduth Street where it branched south then passed through Jesters Court and Howling Cat Court before terminating on Cage Street.
